entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
